page.title: 04THE CASTLE BESIEGED,LINCOLN.
page.content: Every year the{Civil War siege}of the castle is re-enacted.I went to watch it. I walked through the gates and found people dressed in old-fashioned clothes sitting around their tents and cooking. Then came the best bit - the {storming of the castle.}It started with a large bang which made everyone jump. This was to represent the {Parliamentarians}coming up{Steep Hill. You could hear the distant beat of a drum and then another bang as they reached the{Castle square.}People fled for their lives as the Castle gates opened. The {Royalists }were building a barrier when the Parliamentarians arrived holding guns,pikes and swords. There were a lot of bangs and screams as the attackers moved forward. A priest who killed a boy had his throat cut. The coward who kept running away was kicked.Soon{the castle had fallen.
